Identifiers.notes: Firebase assigns installation/device identifiers used for analytics and Crashlytics.

Personal info (Email).notes: Collected only when user signs in with Google for optional sync.

User content (Files & EPUBs).notes: EPUB files remain on device unless user opts into cloud sync.

Reading progress & Settings.notes: Sync is opt-in. Users can delete cloud data from Settings.

Usage analytics.notes: Anonymous usage metrics processed by Firebase Analytics.

Crash reports & Diagnostics.notes: Processed by Firebase Crashlytics; may include stack traces, device model, OS version, and identifiers.

play_console_notes: Disclose Firebase (Authentication, Analytics, Crashlytics). Cloud sync is optional and user-controlled via Settings. EPUB files remain local unless sync is enabled. Contact: ne0rmatrix@gmail.com.
